SubjectName: Range and Interquartile Range from a List of Data
QuestionText: Tom and Katie are discussing the 5 plants with these heights: 24 cm, 17 cm, 42 cm, 26 cm, 13 cm. Tom says if all the plants were cut in half, the range wouldn't change. Katie says if all the plants grew by 3 cm each, the range wouldn't change. Who do you agree with?
